# Jetbrains 出品的IDE工具

## 破解方式 

### [无限试用](https://zhile.io/2020/11/18/jetbrains-eval-reset-deprecated.html )
此方式最新版本已无法使用 

下面是每个IDE截止的版本
CLion v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/cpp/CLion-2021.2.2.tar.gz
DataGrip v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/datagrip/datagrip-2021.2.2.tar.gz
GoLand v2021.2.3: https://download.jetbrains.com/go/goland-2021.2.3.tar.gz
IntelliJ v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/idea/ideaIU-2021.2.2.tar.gz
PhpStorm v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/webide/PhpStorm-2021.2.2.tar.gz
PyCharm v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/python/pycharm-professional-2021.2.2.tar.gz
Rider v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/rider/JetBrains.Rider-2021.2.2.tar.gz
RubyMine v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/ruby/RubyMine-2021.2.2.tar.gz
WebStorm v2021.2.2: https://download.jetbrains.com/webstorm/WebStorm-2021.2.2.tar.gz

### [试用key](https://jetbra.in/s )


### 最新版本的破解方式(这个NB!!)

https://www.exception.site/essay/idea-reset-eval

`idea.vmoptions`追加下面的配置
```conf
-javaagent:/Users/liqiushi/poul/scripts/ja-netfilter/ja-netfilter.jar
--add-opens=java.base/jdk.internal.org.objectweb.asm=ALL-UNNAMED
--add-opens=java.base/jdk.internal.org.objectweb.asm.tree=ALL-UNNAMED
```

idea 验证码：
```
6G5NXCPJZB---
```

pycharm 激活码:
```
EUWT4EE9X2---
```
